func main() {
	i := 0
	for c := rune(0x30a1); c <= rune(0x1b167); c++ {

	}
	fmt.Println()
}

æ³¨æ„ç‚¹ã¨ã—ã¦ã¯ unicode.Katakana ã§ã¯æ¿ç‚¹ãƒ»åŠæ¿ç‚¹ã®çµåˆæ–‡å­—ãŒé™¤å¤–ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã ã‚ã†ã‹ã€‚ ã‚ã¨åŠè§’ã‚«ãƒŠã‚’è­˜åˆ¥ã™ã‚‹ unicode.RangeTable ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒ–ãƒ«ã¯ãªã•ãã†ã ã€‚ ã¾ãï¼Œå˜ç´”ã ã‹ã‚‰è‡ªå‰ã§ä½œã‚Œã°ã„ã„ã‚“ã ã‘ã©ã€‚ ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã‹ãªã€‚

//go:build run
// +build run

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"unicode"
)

var halfWidthKatakana = &unicode.RangeTable{
	R16: []unicode.Range16{
		{0xff61, 0xff9f, 1},
	},
	R32: []unicode.Range32{},
}

func main() {
	i := 0
	for c := rune(0x30a1); c <= rune(0x1b167); c++ {
		if unicode.In(c, unicode.Katakana) && unicode.In(c, halfWidthKatakana) {
			fmt.Printf("%#U ", c)
			i++
			i &= 0x0f
			if i == 0 {
				fmt.Println()
			}
		}
	}
	fmt.Println()
}

ã¤ã„ã§ã« NFKC (Normalization Form Compatibility Composition) æ­£è¦åŒ–ã§è¨˜å·ãŒã©ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«å¤‰æ›ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã‹è¦‹ã¦ã¿ã‚ˆã†ã€‚ ä»¥ä¸‹ã¯å¤‰æ›ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®ã¿ã‚’åˆ—æŒ™ã—ãŸã‚‚ã®ã€‚

//go:build run
// +build run

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"unicode"

	"golang.org/x/text/unicode/norm"
)

func main() {
	for c := rune(0x30a1); c <= rune(0x1b167); c++ {
		if unicode.In(c, unicode.Katakana) {
			n := norm.NFKC.String(string(c))
			if n != string(c) {
				fmt.Printf("%#U -> %s\n", c, n)
			}
		}
	}
}

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"unicode"
)

func main() {
	i := 0
	for c := rune(0x3041); c <= rune(0x1f200); c++ {
		if unicode.In(c, unicode.Hiragana) {
			fmt.Printf("%#U ", c)
			i++
			i &= 0x0f
			if i == 0 {
				fmt.Println()
			}
		}
	}
	fmt.Println()
}

//go:build run

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"unicode"

	"golang.org/x/text/unicode/norm"
)

func main() {
	for c := rune(0x3041); c <= rune(0x1f200); c++ {
		if unicode.In(c, unicode.Hiragana) {
			n := norm.NFKC.String(string(c))
			if n != string(c) {
				fmt.Printf("%#U -> %s\n", c, n)
			}
		}
	}
}
